Test Name: Herpes Simplex Virus (HSV) Type 1- and Type 2-Specific Antibodies, IgG, Serum
Purpose: To qualitatively detect HSV-1 and HSV-2 IgG antibodies in serum by ELISA for evidence of past or present infection.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA reader (450 nm/620â€“630 nm) with associated pipettes and plate washer
